message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.MM 

This paper is about semantic segmentation, which is a computer vision task. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper proposes a new module for context aggregation in Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), which involves learning adaptive context information. This suggests that the paper may also belong to the sub-categories cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), which are all related to machine learning and artificial intelligence. Finally, the paper evaluates its proposed method on two datasets, which suggests that it may also belong to the sub-category cs.MM (Multimedia).
